pci_projects_project_quota_increase_cont: Are you sure you want to increase the quotas for your {{projectInfo}} project?
pci_projects_project_quota_increase_succ: Your quota increase request has been processed. Click here to track its progress.
pci_projects_project_quota_increase_erro: An error has occurred increasing your quotas: {{ message }}.
pci_projects_project_quota_increase_buy_: The purchase order for adding credits to your project is available here
You can add credit to your Public Cloud project to get access to a higher level of quotas.
pci_projects_project_quota_increase_paym: Once you have confirmed the addition of quotas, this credit will be taken from your registered payment method and can no longer be refunded. It will then be used automatically for the billing of your project only.
pci_projects_project_quota_information_b: Please fill in all fields on this form to have your increase request processed. Without a full registration process, we will not be able to respond favorably to your request. Thank you for your understanding.
pci_projects_project_quota_assistance_de: Create and track support requests as needed. You can view, sort, and access archived requests
pci_projects_project_quota_assistance_su: To make your request easier to process, please only create one ticket per issue.
Have you found the answer to your request? If yes, you can close your ticket via the OVHcloud Control Panel.
